Build Visual Automation Workflows

[vc_column_text]Visualize the buyer’s journey and create marketing automation workflows with the intuitive builder. Point and click to build automation tasks. Expand automation workflows with branching logic to follow whatever path your buyers take. Combine tasks and action groups to create specific touch points on your lead’s path to conversion. Set up lead nurturing campaigns and messaging triggers that respond to your leads, instead of sending them on a one-track buyer’s journey.[/vc_column_text]

Improve Conversion Rates with Lead Nurturing

[vc_column_text]Set up drip email campaigns in the marketing automation platform to engage leads throughout the sales process. Educate new prospects about your brand, services, and products with carefully tailored, automated email campaigns. Keep your brand top-of-mind with timely messaging that responds to user behavior. Our marketing automation services will notify your sales team when leads are ready to buy.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row Focus Your Campaigns with Lead Scoring

[vc_column_text]Focus your sales team on hot prospects. Use the digital marketing automation platform to score leads based on engagement. Choose custom metrics to increase or decrease scores; including page visits, filled out forms, content downloads and specific demographic characteristics that fit your sales model. Decrease scores by setting a “decay rate”, and our marketing automation services will automatically update lead scores over time. Free up your sales team by automatically nurturing leads until they are ready to be converted into customers.[/vc_column_text]

Supercharge Marketing Automation with Dynamic Lists

[vc_column_text]What’s the key to powerful behavioral-based customer segmentation? Accurate, realtime information. Create dynamic lists that automatically update as contacts meet the list’s criteria. Use the digital marketing automation platform to keep a running list of every lead who is interested in a specific set of products, comes from a specific location, has a lead score above “x”, or visits pricing pages. Review lists and get the big picture of how prospects respond to your website.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” Create Rich Personas to Tailor Your Campaigns

[vc_column_text]Build out your buyer personas with our convenient and customizable template, ready to integrate with our marketing automation services. Then, set up dynamic emails and landing pages designed to resonate with each persona. Segment your messaging and lead nurturing campaigns by persona to deliver ultra-personalized content that really converts. Store buyer personas on the quick-access marketing automation platform, and update content and campaigns to reflect audiences over time.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner Update Your Team Directly with Email and Text Alerts

[vc_column_text]Trigger automation workflows to send internal messages to marketing, sales and customer service teams. Get instant notifications via email and SMS message whenever you make a sale, land a high-quality lead, or successfully move a prospect along in their buyer’s journey. Receive actionable data and respond accordingly – without even logging in to the marketing automation application.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row Postback Data and Third-Party Integrations for Marketing Automation Services

[vc_column_text]Pass SharpSpring data to your application, database, or CRM of choice, by simply adding a Postback URL. Set up easy third-party integrations in the marketing automation platform, and leave data transfers and messaging campaigns to operate automatically. Break down barriers in your team when you integrate SharpSpring into your marketing, sales and customer service stacks.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css_animation=”fadeIn” css=”.vc_custom_1504293392300{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column]

Dynamic Landing Pages for Customized Conversions

[vc_column_text]

Engage your visitors with content designed just for them. Let your sales and marketing teams take the lead, without the need to refer back to developers. Simply right-click to swap out images, headlines and body text in the marketing automation application. Build a single page that resonates with multiple audiences as it adapts seamlessly to their demographics, interests, and behaviors.

[/vc_column_text][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/182751787″ el_width=”70″ align=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” equal_height=”yes” End Cart Abandonment

[vc_column_text]Automatically follow up with leads that forgo their potential purchases via instant email workflows. Turn abandoned shopping carts into redeemed transactions with our marketing automation services. Improve sales rates by ending cart abandonment and free up your team to focus on other tasks.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”feature-image-right inner-column-right” Track Leads Across Multiple Devices

[vc_column_text]SharpSpring recognizes and tracks all of the various devices a contact may use to visit your site. Follow leads across smartphones, desktops, laptops, tablets, smart speakers and even brick-and-mortar stores. Get a more complete view of the buyer’s journey and understand how leads find your brand.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1515715768012{padding-top: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;}”][vc_column]

Dynamic Email Marketing Automation Services

[vc_column_text]

Reach people directly with personalized emails that convert to sales. Send personalized, dynamic and relevant emails to your leads, without the need for time-consuming coding. Swap out entire phrases, images and offers using an intuitive interface – all based on what you know about your contacts. The result: emails that truly convert.

[/vc_column_text][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/185798136″ el_width=”70″ align=”center”]
